title: Cannot log in
body: For some reason, the client won't let me log in. I've tried contacting Riot support and have so far gotten nothing. I don't have this problem on the PBE. Is anyone else having this problem? What is happening?

replies.body: I'd like to help but need some more info.  What error message are you getting exactly?  Do you have a ticket number?

It's the "your username or password is incorrect, please enter it again or contact support" message. Which is wrong because I've been entering the right information for my account. Did I get banned and not get told? Did my password change? That's not possible since I used the password I normally use to get onto the boards, so I don't know what's going on.

Nope, you'd get a different message for a ban.  Double check your region on your login screen to make sure it's on NA and try a [password reset](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751734-Recovering-Your-Password).  If that doesn't help, reach out through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help you directly update your info.
